content: **thank you ** this little pattern is a humble way of saying **thanks** to all of you who have given me support and friendship throughout these years today december 3 2013 it s been 3 years since i published my first pattern for sale on ravelry it has been a wonderful journey from that day on it is a very special day for me in argentina we celebrate doctor s day which used to be my former profession i am so happy that my life took this turn in this very same day and i got to do what i love most in the world thank you so much for making it possible i hope i have created at least one thing that you enjoyed on top of things this very same day my ravelry group 1 hit 3000 members which has me shocked thank you and to make it extra special this pattern was created using some beautiful yarn i was gifted by a very special friend from the other side of the planet in dubai you can read the story of this yarn if you like on this blog post 2 or you can just download the pattern and start your hat once again thank you for making my life so blessed ~joji find the **german version** here in yarn over berlin s group pages thank you http //www ravelry com/groups/yarn-over-berlin/pages/a-little-lonely-cable 3 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/designs-by-joji 2 http //www jojiknits blogspot com ar/2013/08/from-dubai-with-love html 3 http //www ravelry com/groups/yarn-over-berlin/pages/a-little-lonely-cable
